translation: Prossiga para a próxima missão?{#Name=" "}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}

translation: Todos se reunem em um lugar{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: O que você está fazendo com os dedos?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What're you doing with your fingers?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Contando todas as coisas ruins nesta floresta.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Countin' all the bad stuff in this forest.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nós temos veneno... Nós temos os mortos-vivos...{LF}Nós temos trolls... Nós temos titãs...{#Name="Dito"}
source: We got poison... We got the undead...{LF}We got trolls... We got titans...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Isso é difícilmente minha ideia de um bom tempo.{#Name="Dito"}
source: This is hardly my idea of a good time.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Pensei que você gostava de matar coisas feias.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I thought you enjoyed killing ugly things.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Pensei que você estaria feliz como um porco no lixo agora.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Figured you'd be happy as a pig in shit right now.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Pfft.{#Name="Dito"}
source: ...Pfft.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Há algo... Não sei, cara.{LF}Há apenas algo errado sobre este lugar.{#Name="Dito"}
source: There's something... I don't know, man.{LF}There's just something wrong about this place.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Parece que esta floresta está se desintegrando.{LF}Como se tudo estivesse de alguma forma...perdendo coesão.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: It feels like this forest is falling apart.{LF}As if everything is somehow...losing cohesion.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Certo? Isso está me fazendo sentir tudo doente e coisa.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Right? It's making me feel all sick and stuff.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Sim. Estou também atormentado com desconforto.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Indeed. I am wracked with discomfort as well.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Tanto desconforto...lindo desconforto... Nnnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Such terrible...beautiful discomfort... Nnnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Uh oh. Lá vai ele.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Uh oh. There he goes.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sim!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Indeed!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: The end of the world may be nigh, and yet we{LF}sit here wracked with inaction...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: The end of the world may be nigh, and yet we{LF}sit here wracked with inaction...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Oh, how I love to be frustrated so!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Oh, how I love to be frustrated so!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: You feel it too, Octa?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You feel it too, Octa?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, I feel something all right! Something in my trousers!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh, I feel something all right! Something in my trousers!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Besides that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Besides that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Dito said he felt something...weird going on around here.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dito said he felt something...weird going on around here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh. That. Well, yes, the world does seem a tad out of balance. {#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh. That. Well, yes, the world does seem a tad out of balance. {#Name="Octa"}

translation: Though that could just be all the blood that's currently{LF}rushing from my head!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Though that could just be all the blood that's currently{LF}rushing from my head!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Perhaps a brief ride on my hobby horse would help{LF}make me right again. What do you say?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps a brief ride on my hobby horse would help{LF}make me right again. What do you say?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Are we gonna be okay, Zero? I mean, with all this...{LF}important-sounding stuff you guys are talking about.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Are we gonna be okay, Zero? I mean, with all this...{LF}important-sounding stuff you guys are talking about.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Don't butt in on things you don't understand.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't butt in on things you don't understand.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey, come on! I wanna talk about important-sounding stuff too!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey, come on! I wanna talk about important-sounding stuff too!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: えっ{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: えっ{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 私の知能に追いつけるとは思わないけどぉお、そこはほらぁ{#Name="セント"}
source: 私の知能に追いつけるとは思わないけどぉお、そこはほらぁ{#Name="セント"}

translation: Eu posso ensinar se eu abaixar meu nível, é isso que significa ter verdadeira inteligência.
source: 私がレベルをさげて教えられるしぃい、{LF}てか、それができるのが真の知性だしぃい{#Name="セント"}

translation: Ajude-me, Zero! Cent não para!
source: 助けて、ゼロ！　セントが止まらない！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Eu só quero saber o que está acontecendo.
source: I just want to know what's going on.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Eu quero saber sobre todas as coisas...
source: I want to know about all kinds of things...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hmm.... Quem é essa mulher que continua a pairar{LF}nos cantos da minha mente?
source: Hmm.... Who is this woman that continues to flit about{LF}the corners of my mind?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Ela tem cabelo azul curto e olhos travessos.{LF}Acho que ela está...me olhando.
source: She has short blue hair and mischievous eyes.{LF}I think she's...looking at me.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Parece com Dois.
source: Sounds like Two.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Dois? Hmm. Então é Dois, é isso?
source: Two? Hmm. So that's Two, is it?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Dois? Hmm. Então é Dois, é isso?
source: Two? Hmm. So that's Two, is it?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Isso é estranho. Por que não consigo tirar seu rosto da minha mente?
source: That's odd. Why can't I get her face out of my mind?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Então o que fazemos agora?
source: So what do we do now?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Vamos mais fundo na floresta. Não há outra escolha.
source: Go deeper into the forest. There is no other choice.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Precisamos encontrar Lady One ou Lady Three{LF}o mais rápido possível.
source: We need to find Lady One or Lady Three{LF}as soon as possible.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Talvez possamos encontrar os dois ao mesmo tempo.{LF}Isso certamente vai tornar as coisas mais fáceis.
source: Maybe we can find 'em both at once.{LF}That'll certainly make things easier.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Atualizar{#Name="Accord"}
source: Update{#Name="Accord"}

translation: A divergência desencadeada pela singularidade conhecida como Zero{#Name="Accord"}
source: The divergence triggered by the singularity known as Zero{#Name="Accord"}

translation: levou a uma ampla gama de anomalias observadas.{#Name="Accord"}
source: has led to a wide range of observed anomalies.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: A floresta mudou, e seus inimigos são mais violentos. Além disso,{#Name="Accord"}
source: The forest has changed, and its foes are more violent. Furthermore,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: a singularidade conhecida como Dois, e seu discípulo, Cent,{#Name="Accord"}
source: the singularity known as Two, and her disciple, Cent,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: agora estão agindo independentemente um do outro.{#Name="Accord"}
source: are now acting independently of one another.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: M3240_E0010_QV: Iniciar Gravação{#Name="Accord"}
source: M3240_E0010_QV: Begin Recording{#Name="Accord"}
